pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a really basic metapackage to pull in some stuff which Gentoo doesn't include by default but is generally considered standard on almost every other big distribution of Linux (and most other UNIX derivatives). This builds on phsy-system-meta by pulling in mcelog, microcode-data, acpid, usbutils, pciutils, irqbalance, dmidecode and hdparm. All of these are pretty standard on x86 systems, but not necessarily other architectures.
